```{r}
genes <- read.delim("gene.description.txt",stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
head(genes)
dim(genes)
```


```{r}
chr8Genes <- genes[genes$Chromosome=="chr8",]
head(chr8Genes)
```

```{r}
chr8GenesOrd <-chr8Genes[order(chr8Genes$Start),]
head(chr8GenesOrd)
write.table(chr8GenesOrd,"chromosome8.gene.info.txt",sep="\t")
```
